summary: Changes menu music, combat music and loading music
descriptionHtml:
---------------------------------
RainingXsalami\'s Skyrim Sound mod
---------------------------------

This mod changes...
1. Main Menu Music
2. Combat Music
3. Town/Exploring/Loading Music

Main Menu Music changed to
Future World Music-Dream Chasers
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YftLJBLie8o

Combat Music changed to
All Time Best Heroic Song
www.youtube.com/watch?v=Xsl01e4hkbY

Exploring Music changed to
Pachelbel\'s Canon-Ukulele
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_rsI1GtIY-U&feature=related

Thanks for downloading, this is my first mod that changes sound,
so it\'s a bit simple. I changed the thing you would probably 
hear most, and now is working on dungeon music. Thanks to
Vikichan who made a mp3 to xwm converter, without it I could not
have made changes to the music. All music was downloaded by Youtube-Mp3.

-------
Install
-------
1. Open rxs sound pack.rar
2. Open your data folder
3. Copy the music folder into the data folder
4. Run Skyrim and enjoy.
author: rainingXsalami
